name: Spectre: Definitive Edition
description:
Spectre was the first 'proper' game I ever made - it was a very rough around the edges horror game (along the same lines as 'Slender') that was released in 2012.

For whatever reason, it picked up a bunch of steam on YouTube, with a few popular YouTubers playing it.

Now, for Halloween 2020 I've reimagined it as a short horror experience. There isn't really a goal here other than to be scared, and a playthrough should last 5 to 10 minutes.

I hope you enjoy. I've also included the 'classic' edition of Spectre. Please don't play it, it's terrible.
